s:beans.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans-2.5.xsd urn:org:josso:db:identitystore http://www.josso.org/schema/josso-db-identitystore.xsd urn:org:josso:memory:identitystore http://www.josso.org/schema/josso-memory-identitystore.xsd urn:org:josso:db:sessionstore http://www.josso.org/schema/josso-db-sessionstore.xsd urn:org:josso:memory:sessionstore http://www.josso.org/schema/josso-memory-sessionstore.xsd urn:org:josso:db:assertionstore http://www.josso.org/schema/josso-db-assertionstore.xsd urn:org:josso:memory:assertionstore http://www.josso.org/schema/josso-memory-assertionstore.xsd

db-istore:datasource-store.userQueryString: SELECT ID_USUARIO AS NAME FROM USUARIO WHERE ID_USUARIO = ?
db-istore:datasource-store.credentialsQueryString: SELECT ID_USUARIO AS USERNAME, PASSWORD FROM USUARIO WHERE ID_USUARIO = ?
db-istore:datasource-store.resetCredentialDml: UPDATE USUARIO SET PASSWORD = crypt(?, gen_salt('bf', 16)) WHERE ID_USUARIO = ?

db-sstore:datasource-store.loadQuery: SELECT SESSION_ID, USERNAME, CREATION_TIME, LAST_ACCESS_TIME, ACCESS_COUNT, MAX_INACTIVE_INTERVAL, VALID FROM JOSSO_SESSION WHERE SESSION_ID = ?
db-sstore:datasource-store.loadAllQuery: SELECT SESSION_ID, USERNAME, CREATION_TIME, LAST_ACCESS_TIME, ACCESS_COUNT, MAX_INACTIVE_INTERVAL, VALID FROM JOSSO_SESSION
db-sstore:datasource-store.updateDml: UPDATE JOSSO_SESSION SET USERNAME = ?, CREATION_TIME = ?, LAST_ACCESS_TIME = ?, ACCESS_COUNT = ?, MAX_INACTIVE_INTERVAL = ?, VALID = ? WHERE SESSION_ID = ?
db-sstore:datasource-store.loadByUserNameQuery: SELECT SESSION_ID, USERNAME, CREATION_TIME, LAST_ACCESS_TIME, ACCESS_COUNT, MAX_INACTIVE_INTERVAL, VALID FROM JOSSO_SESSION WHERE USERNAME = ?
db-sstore:datasource-store.loadByValidQuery: SELECT SESSION_ID, USERNAME, CREATION_TIME, LAST_ACCESS_TIME, ACCESS_COUNT, MAX_INACTIVE_INTERVAL, VALID FROM JOSSO_SESSION WHERE VALID = ?
db-sstore:datasource-store.loadByLastAccessTimeQuery: SELECT SESSION_ID, USERNAME, CREATION_TIME, LAST_ACCESS_TIME, ACCESS_COUNT, MAX_INACTIVE_INTERVAL, VALID FROM JOSSO_SESSION WHERE LAST_ACCESS_TIME = ?

db-astore:datasource-store.loadAllQuery: SELECT ASSERTION_ID, SECURITY_DOMAIN_NAME, SSO_SESSION_ID, CREATION_TIME, VALID FROM JOSSO_ASSERTION
db-astore:datasource-store.loadQuery: SELECT ASSERTION_ID, SECURITY_DOMAIN_NAME, SSO_SESSION_ID, CREATION_TIME, VALID FROM JOSSO_ASSERTION WHERE ASSERTION_ID = ?
